statements: DELETE FROM recipes WHERE chef_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM recipes WHERE chef_name = 'John Doe' AND recipe_name = 'Spaghetti';
DELETE FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id = 100 AND unit_of_measure = 'oz';
DELETE FROM cooking_instructions WHERE recipe_id = (SELECT recipe_id FROM recipes WHERE chef_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM chefs WHERE expertise = 'French Cuisine';
DELETE FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 5 AND prep_time > 30;
